ARABIC: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When Our Signs are recited to him, he says, 'Just myths of previous peoples!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When you recite Our revelations to him, he says: "These are fables of long ago."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and whenever Our verses are rehearsed to him, he says: “These are fairy- tales of times gone by.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, “These are stories of earlier people.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: When Our Ayat are recited to him, he says: "Tales of the men of old!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: When Our communications are recited to him, he says: Stories of those of yore.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: When Our signs are recited to him, he says, 'Fairy-tales of the ancients!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: That, when Our revelations are recited unto him, he saith: Mere fables of the men of old.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: when Our revelations are recited to him, he says, "These are just ancient fables."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: When Our revelations are rehearsed Unto him, he saith: fables of the ancients.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When Our signs are recited to him, he says, ‘Myths of the ancients!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When to him are rehearsed Our Signs, "Tales of the ancients", he cries!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: When Our Verses (of the Quran) are recited to him, he says: "Tales of the men of old!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: When Our verses are recited to him, he says: 'They are but fairytales of the ancients'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: When Our Verses are recited to him, he says, “Myths of the ancients!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [68:15] When Our signs — the Qur’ān — are recited to him, he says, that they are [merely], ‘Fables of the ancients!’, in other words, he denies them [in arrogance] on account of the mentioned things which We have bestowed on him out of Our grace (a variant reading [for an of the previous verse] has [the interrogative] a-an).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (That, when Our revelations) the Qur'an, detailing the commands and prohibitions (are recited unto him, he saith: Mere fables of the men of old) this is just the talk and lies of the men of old.
